dataset_id: CAMEX-4 DC-8 INFORMATION COLLECTION AND TRANSMISSION SYSTEM V1
organizations: Global Hydrology Resource Center, Marshall Space Flight Center, NASA
title: CAMEX-4 DC-8 INFORMATION COLLECTION AND TRANSMISSION SYSTEM V1
summary: The CAMEX-4 DC-8 Information Collection and Transmission System dataset was collected by the Information Collection and Transmission System (ICATS), which is designed to: 1) Interface and process avionics and environmental paramaters from the Navigational Management System, GPS, Central Air Data Computer, Embedded GPS/INS, and analog voltage sources from aircraft and experimenters, 2) Furnish engineering unit values of selected parameters and computed functions for real-time video display, and archive ASCII data at experimenter stations, 3) Archive engineering unit values of 'Appendix A' (to the ICATS document included with dataset documentation) on data storage for post flight retrieval.
